briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Faster-acting Insulin Aspart Compared to NovoRapid® Both in Combination With Insulin Degludec in Children and Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Faster-acting Insulin Aspart Compared to NovoRapid® Both in Combination With Insulin Degludec in Children and Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes

arms.label: Meal-time faster-acting insulin aspart and insulin degludec
Meal-time NovoRapid® (insulin aspart) and insulin degludec
Post-meal faster-acting insulin aspart and insulin degludec

summary: This trial is conducted globally. The aim of the trial is to investigate efficacy and safety of faster-acting insulin aspart compared to NovoRapid® both in combination with insulin degludec in children and adolescents with type 1 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in the Percentage of HbA1c
